name: @cowors/api-codegen
description: OpenAPI to Zod schema generator for Cowors SDKs

scripts.generate:admin: npm run build && node dist/cli-simple.js --input http://localhost:5001/swagger/json --output ../admin-sdk/src/generated --name AdminAPI --filter admin
scripts.generate:user: npm run build && node dist/cli-simple.js --input http://localhost:5001/swagger/json --output ../user-sdk/src/generated --name UserAPI --filter user
scripts.generate:partner: npm run build && node dist/cli-simple.js --input http://localhost:5001/swagger/json --output ../partner-sdk/src/generated --name PartnerAPI --filter partner

author: Cowors Team
